item.title: Command Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

You have

Meaning, your rights have to be higher than 0.
Just remove it and it should work.
So your code should be

if (playerCommand.startsWith("setlevel")) { c.sendMessage("You need to be staff to use this!"); } if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot set your level while in PVP."); } for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("Please take all your armour and weapons off before using this command."); return; } }

item.title: Command Won't Work
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

For some reason my setlevel command doesn’t work, it just keeps saying “You must be staff to use this command.” Someone help please?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("setlevel") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.sendMessage("You need to be staff to use this!"); } if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You cannot set your level while in PVP."); } for (int j = 0; j < c.playerEquipment.length; j++) { if (c.playerEquipment[j] > 0) { c.sendMessage("Please take all your armour and weapons off before using this command."); return; } }

Read full topic
